content.rendered:
Smile Foundation is delighted to launch the Shell NXplorers Junior programme for students of classes 6th and 7th from 120 schools in Kerala, Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.

Under the innovative NXplorers Junior educational programme, the young students will be given the tools and strategies they need to understand the complexity and recognise how they can shape and create change.

The innovative initiative will benefit underserved students from government schools and affordable private schools, studying in rural and hard-to-reach areas. It also endeavors to create awareness amongst parents on the importance of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) education, especially for girl children.
